Name: sin-naseemismailand-la
Author: Naseem Ismail And Masoor Maulana, Kaleel

Translations.Text: husma hira vena taramata adhika vegayen duvana asvayin matada
(duvana vegayenma kura gætennata salasva) gini pupuru visi vannata salasvana dæya matada
tavada ude pandara (saturan kerehi) pæna duvana dæya matada
(ese vegayen duvana vita, valakulu men) emagin duvili avussa damana dæya matada
pasuva (saturange senava) madhyayehi e hetuven atulu vana dæya matada sattakinma
niyata vasayenma minisa tama deviyanta kelehiguna nodakvanneku vasayen sitinneya
niyata vasayenma ohuma meyata saksi vasayenda sitinneya
niyata vasayenma ohu itamat dædi vasayenma vastuvata adaraya karanneya
sohon (kabru) vala æti dæya pitatata visi karanu læba
sithi æti dæya elidarav karanu labana avasthavedi
niyata vasayenma (minisun vana) ovunge deviyan (napuru aya kavarekda? honda aya kavarekda?yi) ovunva edinadi hondin dæna ganneya yanuven ohu dæna gatte nædda
